name: 100 Meter Dash
description:
Alternate left and right arrow keys to run.

Don't run too fast or you will lose energy.

Lose all your energy and bad things happen.

You race different athletes each time so keep playing to meet them all!

Made for Ludum Dare 40

Submission Page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/40/100-meter-dash
